sentence.text: WhatsApp should need to make personal stickers adding option in WhatsApp aap .
I want any indresting stickers
I would have given no star ... but i have to give two because of ur good wallpapers but the problem is there is a notification coming " can't load pls retry " every time

it is soooooo bad when i choose my wallpaper there is an notification on the screen cant load please try again and then when i try again the same notification was there and my preahious wallpaper was also gone and i hate it so please fix this problem
Please add a lot of sticker because it have less sticker , im iranian !

1 . It does n't let you test emojis or stickers , just that default message ; 2 . There are only a few backgrounds , without the possibility of adding more , from your gallery ; 3 . There are no settings or ways to adjust those backgrounds , like lighting or quality .
Why this fsukin notification
Terrible app for coloured notifications .
All had too many ads , poor lighting , or lousy notifications .
Does n't show notifications .
If you 're like me and can't stand to have a blank screen when your phone is off and want consistent access to your notifications , this is the app for you .
If it were n't for this app , I 'd never know when I have notifications unless I was next to it to hear every sound .
Working fine but the notification icons are not using the brightness setting set for the clock , can it be fixed ?
app is a big battery hog , Developer never responds to any emails Notification Wake did not work on my S21
Simulation of Notifications LED & shifting of AOD to Prevent pixel burn is Great & make it upto OEM standards , Using it on my new OnePlus 7
Good for phones that do n't have a notification LED .
The notification icons are getting the text color regardless of selecting the app color option in the settings .
The AOD has the features I love , I can get the notification display without the clock .
Issues with notification .
Tested with whatsapp notification ; but its not visible on always on screen .
I would also like to see the notification icons appear in their original colors .

I love this app and i want to give 5 star but only one problem it does n't show notification icon as I already turned on notification for other apps but no and edge glow effect also does n't work or my Infinix mobile
I only want to make my phone show time when notification arrives or I tap / double tap on the screen .....

I set checkbox custom , I tap custom location , I enter London , I see London in the app's custom dialig box , I do n't see any other controls to apply this custom value London , I tried to swipe left , I tried to press the back button - in all cases I constantly see the old Mountain View location without any notifications , payment requirements or etc .
